page.subtitleV2: Turn ideas into original soundtracks and natural speech with AI
page.onlyVoiceSubtitleV2: Turn ideas into natural speech with AI
page.onlyMusicSubtitleV2: Turn ideas into original soundtracks with AI

voiceTab.note: Please avoid entering confidential or sensitive information into this tool. Stick to non-sensitive content for privacy and security.
voiceTab.placeholder: Click the “Add Voice” button and find the perfect voice to bring your text to life!

AIMusicGenerator.title: AI Music Generator
AIMusicGenerator.subtitle: Unleash the perfect soundtrack for your projects in seconds! Whether you’re creating content for social media, vlogs, or professional projects, you’ll always have the perfect tune to match the vibe.
AIMusicGenerator.optionSelectionTitle: Select the option to start generating the perfect music for your project
AIMusicGenerator.GenerateMusicWithVideoTitle: Generate Music That Fits Your Video
AIMusicGenerator.GenerateMusicWithVideoSubtitle: This tool analyses your video’s style and mood, then uses advanced AI to create custom music that fits seamlessly with the visuals.
AIMusicGenerator.GenerateMusicWithBriefSubtitle: Provide a brief or a set of keywords, and our AI will generate custom music that perfectly matches the style and mood you're looking for.
AIMusicGenerator.GenerateMusicWithTagsSubtitle: Craft the ideal music for your project by simply selecting the genre, mood, and tempo you want.
AIMusicGenerator.ProcessingText: AI analysis will take some time to process. You can explore other projects meanwhile.
